help.title: Help pannel
help.name: Name
help.guild_only: Command can only be used in servers
help.admin_only: If the command require the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission
help.owner_only: If the command can be used only by the owner
help.information:
Find information on the command provided.
Mandatory arguments `[]`, optional arguments `<>`.
help.cmd_usage: Do {prefix}help [command] to get more information about it.

setprefix.description: Change the default prefix to the specified prefix, you can still use the default prefix

prefix-reset.description: Change the default prefix to the specified prefix, you can still use the default prefix
prefix-reset.reset_prefix: Are you sure you want to reset the prefix?
prefix-reset.confirmation: The prefix has been resetted to `{prefix}`

anime.description: Get informations about the specified anime
anime.stop_collect_msg: The message will stop to collect messages in 60 seconds
anime.choose: Choose your anime between the displayed numbers
anime.number_range: Please insert a number between 1 and {number}

docs.description: Get the djs doc in an embed, you can specify the source by doing `--src {source}` (without the brackets) The sources are listed here: `stable`, `master`, `commando`, `rpc`, `akairo`, `akairo-master` and `collection`
docs.valid_sources: This doesn't seem to be a valid source, sources are listed here: `stable`, `master`, `commando`, `rpc`, `akairo`, `akairo-master` and `collection`
